am i that hard to love? 

i don't understand why nobody wants to be with me and of course the people i want to be with are the ones who are killing me. 

help me please
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/19379.html

It has been way to long since I wrote in this last, honestly. Everything is so fucked up right now it's not even funny. where to start.

well me and pat aren't going out anymore. I couldn't do it anymore so I broke it off. We lived together for about a year and that's all it took for me to realize i wan't happy at all. I had no friends, i couldn't do anything without getting accused of doing something and i felt trapped. 

So I met this new kid who i'm currently dating...BIG MISTAKE. This relationship is a joke.. that's all i have to say. It revolves around his ex and it's rediculous. I can't take it anymore and i don't know why i can't just get myself to leave. I hate being alone and that's what i don't want to happen. 


I miss Cudney....end of story. 


It think about the kid EVERYDAY and I know i'd be happy with him. I know I would
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/19175.html

So a year and a half ago I met this boy right? Well he's amazing and I'm gonna marry that boy..why? because I love him.


umm.. thats all

*Me*
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/18804.html

Hey everyone I'm still alive SURPRISE!! haha it's been so long since I been on here but everytime I make a new entry I say that. My life's been so crazy lately I'm just never on the computer anymore. 

----->Yes I'm still with my incredible boyfriend Pat and we're doing great. I love him to death.

----->I just finished school which is amazing so technically I am now a SENIOR. yes that's right...only one more year left. 

----->I don't really talk to my best friend Stephanie anymore that's complicated to explain but we kind of fell off and I been tryin to get back on but she isnt cooperating so I gave up...oh well...

----->I haven't cut myself in a REALLY long time! yay! thanks to Pat who I made a promise to and I refuse to break it. 

----->BAD NEWS: all my friends graduated this year so I'm all by myself again...and yes you've guessed it....Mike graduated too and is no longer there for me in school anymore....no more skipping out of classes to meet up with him somewhere or walking completely out of my way just to see him...oh well. life goes on.
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/18634.html

So now seriously I'm going to try to keep this updated for everyone to read of what a mess up I really am...

I talked to one of my best friends last night and everything got blown out of proportion. Not to mention I made this person cry and I hate doing that. Well this person found out I still cut myself and that I did it again last night. I made a promise to them that I'd try to stop myself and they're gonna help me. I want to tell Pat (my bf) about all of it but I'm just scared that people aren't going to understand and I know he'll be upset with me. Especially if I just go right out and tell him "Oh by the way I tried to kill myself last night.." yea that won't go over to well. Today in school I just felt so down because of last night, and it made me realize that there really is something wrong with me and that I need help. I never knew what I was doing was hurting other people. I talked to this person all night,well more like cried, cause I don't want to do it anymore but it's just so much easier said then done.

I want to tell Pat everything and ask for his help because I think he could. I'm just scared though to tell him some stuff and I don't want to hurt him because of my stupidity. I just know, like I've said in earlier entry's, that I can't do this on my own. I really truly need help. I know now that I am not well. I'm to scared to talk to my parents because I know they won't understand. Just like my mom did. I don't believe in therapist's or them "doctors" who just make you feel worse about yourself after you've left then when you got there. I feel so sick and disgusted with myself I could just puke. I haven't been eating much lately, and when I think I'm hungry I try to eat but just the sight of it makes my stomach turn. Even my journal's. It's like it's starting to make things worse. I don't know why but it makes me feel worse about myself. The scars on my wrist from last night are going away, I kind of wish they wouldn't. I've been feigning it so bad lately. I get the gut feeling in my stomach and the shakes so bad. It makes me cry sometimes and freak out on my friends because I can't get what I want. I want this to stop and go away..I DON'T WANT TO BE LIKE THIS ANYMORE! It's making me feel worse then I did before I did it. I never felt this horrible about cutting and it's been three years. I think this time it really hit me to hear someone actually tell me that I am not well and there really is something wrong with me.  I think that's what's bringing me down the most. I've known that there was something wrong with me I just never wanted to pay attention to it. The thing is I don't even know why I do it. My life isn't even something I can complain about. My friend told me that there is something there that's bugging me and causing me to do this to myself, something in the past or in the present. The more I think about that it just doesn't make any sense because I really don't think there is. What really got me down was when they said that if they find out that I'm still doing it then they are going to start doing it too. That's NOT what I want. I feel that no matter what I do and no matter how hard I try it'll never stop. It's been to long. It's not like I just started doing it yesterday, we're talking three years. That's a long time. That's why I'm saying that I can't do this without some help from those closest to me. I'm just scared to hurt them. I just hope they'll understand.
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/18356.html

Ok so starting today or something I am actually going to try to keep updating this cause I haven't been doing such a great job. It's just hard because nothing new has been going on in my life.

It's been so freakin hot outside it's unbelievable and I can't take it. All I been doing is sleeping because there is nothing else to do and I'm to lazy to walk anywhere because it's to hot. This weekend I am going to my mom's house for my little sister's birthday party. I have to chaprone I guess so this is going to be a blast. I am going to take my friend Dezarae though so hopefully that will help pass some time. School's been done and thank god I don't have summer school. I only have to go back in August to retake an exam and thats it. So I was very much excited. I am stuck babysitting all day today and it kind of sucks because I am so out of it I can't stand myself. Oh well it will be a good paycheck then. Score! 

well that's it for now because I am having a mind blank as usual. So....BYE!

*Danielle*
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/18134.html

ok so there is a very important date that I forgot to add on my journal because I am blonde and tend to forget things. So no hard feelings mike! You know I still love ya! So on December 19 I forgot to wish him a happy birthday because I was probably to busy complaining about how much people suck and how I hate life or some stupid bullshit like that....So.........

 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY MIKE!!!!!!!!!

 

ok so now you should feel special....BYE!!
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/17743.html

Damn it feels like forever since I updated in here last. I don't even know what to say honestly. School's finally over which freakin rocks and hopefully I won't end up in summer school. I still haven't recieved a letter but there's always monday and that would be my luck to get it then. 

So tonight I got stuck babysitting and it kinda sucks because I haven't slept at all yet. I got about 4 hours last night at the most. I been sleepin all day and now i'm stuck here all night. Oh well. I have a graduation party tomorrow and I had to go to 2 graduations the other day which was a major drag. I can't wait to just get a day to myself and relax. haha I sound like my life is so hard. but I have been running like crazy it feels like and I want to just sit back and have a day all to myself. I also want to get out too. I haven't hung out with Stephanie in what seems like months and it sucks because we were always together and now like we barely talk at all. I don't want to lose her because of some stupid shit but I'm sure everything will be fine. Both of us have been so busy and now with her going away to camp and everything it's just crazy. Oh well her birthday is coming up and I have to find out what I am going to get her and what I'm going to do for her. Until then I'm just stuck here. So if anyone has any suggestions with what I could do with my life over the summer please leave me some comments!

Danielle <3

I would have used a pencil but that's just not permanent.

To express the things I think?

I'll seal it, send it off and wish it luck with its depart.

Across the air and land easy

SUP BITCHES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! it's been mad long!!! ok anywho.... so lets recap the shit thats been goin on with my life...so I found out that Josh has a girlfriend that well I never knew about. But it's all good. We're cool. I been hanging out with this kid Andy for a few weeks and we're cool too. I guess that just makes me a pretty cool person....haha. BUT ANYWAYS!!!!! haha sry I'm just in a great mood. oh GUESS WHAT! GUESS WHAT!!!!!! MIKE'S BACK IN SCHOOL!!!! YAY!!!! umm....Steph's coming over tomorrow, we're goin to Caz...and we're going camping at Darian this weekend...so yea....BYE!
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/16896.html

Hey!!! Oh man I had the best day EVER yesterday!!! So me and Josh, Mike and Tia are all going to the movies wednesday. I can't wait. Then Josh came and met me after my 7th period class and walked with me to my next class. I didn't know what to say. haha. Then....I went to the Goldfinger concert last night and it was FUCKING GREAT! I had so much fun! The opening bands were Black Maria and The Bottom Line. They rocked. I went and bought myself a t-shirt and while I was up there this guy started talking to me from behind the table just asking me how I was and how I liked the show so far. Well I was talking to him then realized it was the drummer for Goldfinger. I was like oh my god. haha I didn't even realize it. They laughed. Then the guitar player from Bottom line was talking to me and they gave me some free stuff and told me to come and hang out with the band after the show. I was like ok! haha I didn't though but it was such a great time. It was funny because Goldfinger brought everyone on stage and the people were running and jumping into the crowd to crwod surf but nobody was catching them. You'd see them run and jump and then just fall. It was a good time. It deff got the money worth. So then the drummer of Goldfinger came on and told us to rate from 1 to 10. So everyone was like oh god what is he going to do. Well he dropped his pants and was wearing a thong. It was probably the most disturbing thing I ever seen but it got some good rates and not to mention it kept falling off of him. The crowd went crazy when the band was playing. The whole floor was a huge mosh pit! Me and my dad were laughing. We were jumping all over the place and just going nuts. So now the morning after and I am still going crazy and talking funny cause I am still trying to get my voice back. But it was worth it. Me and my dad are thinking of going to the Chevelle concert coming up in May. So I am going to save up some money and go to that one too. WOO!!

I'M SICK OF YOU
By Anna Striegl

I'm sick of you
Claiming my life
Showing me wrong
Thinking you're right.
I'm sick of you
Changing my soul
Screwing me over
Leaving me cold.
I'm sick of you
Telling me lies
Shaking your head
Ignoring my cries.
I'm sick of you
Ruling my being
Turning me inside out
Without even seeing.
I'm sick of you
Saying you care
Showing no love
Pulling my hair.
I'm sick of you
Turning me off
Through all my ideas
You turn and scoff.
I'm sick of you
Arrogance and all
Enjoying my pain
Watching me fall.
I"m sick of you
Killing my freedom
Taking my life
Showing me wrong
When I know I'm right
Throwing me aside
Like a pile of dirt
Telling me
That's all I'm worth
Pushing me down
When I can't get up
Waiting for mistakes
I'm bound to set up
Torturing my every
Aspect of fun
Kicking me to trouble
As if you've won
Telling me
I have no life
Telling me
I'm never right.
I'm sick of you!
I REALLY FUCKING AM.

The past few days have been so much fun. Sunday was my birthday...16 BIZNITCH! I can't wait to get my permit and everything now. Friday I had my friend Cassie's birthday party and it was really fun. We went to the Hampton Inn and it was just alot of fun. "CHARLIE....COME OUT COME OUT WHEREVER YOU ARE.." and "DID I GO ANYWHERE??" me: "NOPE!" haha good times. And we fed a ho-bo that was across the street too! It was great we gave him some of our snacks and then bought him food at ALDI's. Then me and Steph went and got our belly buttons pierced. That was crazy. First thing out of my mouth.."HOLY SHIT! LOOK AT YOUR EARS!" hehe. The girl that was there had a spike coming out of her forehead!! We were like how did you get that pierced? and her response was "oh I got it surgically implanted." I was like holy shit screw that! haha. Then Sunday came and it was MY birthday!! I had a few people over and we all just kind of hung out. It was fun and it was a nice day. So that's about it. Then Cameron's bday was yesterday and Veronica's is tomorrow. Then I got my sister's on the 15th and my brothers on the 22nd. I am going CRAZY! haha to many birthdays at once.

So last night sucked big time. I got to Jessica's house and I met everyone which was cool because everyone was super sweet. Then Cameron came and everything seemed to go down hill from there. It just sucked. We really didn't exchange any words or anything all night. I don't think we even wanted to be in the same room. I kept getting up and leaving. Making excuses that I had to use the bathroom and stupid shit like that. Jessica's brother Joey hit Cameron in the face with a hacky sac it was really funny. That was like the only thing that really made me laugh all night. So then the limo came and picked us up and of course it was like snowing and all nasty outside. But the guys went to the front of the limo to talk and us girls went to the back and played with buttons and the phone and the radio until we got yelled at. It was fun. Then the guys decided that they wanted to play a game. BUt it included us girls taking our clothes off. haha. It was funny. Then we changed roles and made the guys do it. Of course nothing happened though. Mike and Ryan tried all night to get me and Cameron to kiss and well that didn't turn out to well. Just argument. Go figure. So while we were there it was so cold. We were outside maybe 5 minutes at the most and we were soaked! Our makeup was all running down our faces and shit it was really funny. Mike did more complaining while we were there than anyone else did. We were all like...damn we should have kept you home you crabass. It was funny. He didn't think so though. So Cameron did nothing but yell at me all night. It sucked I wanted to go home so freakin bad. Everything I did it was either...Jesus Christ or what the fuck! I was like OH MY GOD! haha. yea it sucked. Then on the ride home I just isolated myself from everyone at the back of the limo and wouldn't talk to anyone. I was so pissed off. Jess was a little upset because she knew I wasn't really having a good time. But I told her it was ok. So we turned all the lights off in the limo and everyone just like layed down and fell asleep. It was a long ride. Cameron ended up coming to the back with me and sitting with me and then he yelled cause I didn't know what I wanted to listen to. Everyone found it shocking cause I wouldn't talk the whole time and then when he yelled at me again in the limo I bitched right back at him. I was fed up. I was like "ARE YOU DONE?! I'M SICK OF THIS! YOU HAVE DONE NOTHING BUT FUCKING BITCHED AT ME THE WHOLE FUCKING TIME AND I'M NOT LISTENING TO IT THE WHOLE FUCKING RIDE HOME TOO. SO MAKE UP YOUR MIND OR SIT SOMEWHERE ELSE!" Yea everyone was speechless but the look on his face was pricless I couldn't help but laugh. But then he seen I was serious and stopped yelling at me. It was cool though because Cameron payed for all my stuff and everything. The ride home was so cold I was like shaking because all my stuff was soaked. I looked like a wet dog. haha. And Cameron gave me his jacket so I wouldn't be cold. It was kind of cute. Then we just layed there and he sang to me and it was cute. But that was about it. That was like the only good thing about last night. Besides that HAPPY BIRTHDAY JESS! haha.
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/15413.html

Well There's not much to say seeing it's only 8:30 in the morning. Oh and look outside...What the eff is that?! Go figure!  So I'll just leave you with a song....

The Tide
And there's three, count 'em three
   children playing on the beach
They were eager to learn,
   to be taught and to teach

There's Veronica
She's biting her lip
   as she watches the waves turn white at the tip
And there's Vada
Radiating with joy
   and luckily she still can't stand the sight of a boy
And lastly there's Dade
His hair dances in the wind
   and he's wondering what love is
And why it has to end

And he can't understand
   how everyone goes on breathing when true love ends
His mother whispers quietly...
Heaven's not a place that you go when you die
It's that moment in life when you actually feel alive
So live for the moment
And take this advice, live by every word
Love is just a hoax so forget anything that you have heard
   and live for the moment now

And there's three, count 'em three
   children growing on the beach
They were eager to learn,
   to be taught and to teach

There's Veronica
She's licking her lips
   as she waits for her real, first passionate kiss
And there's Vada
Can't admit her jealousy
   of her sister Veronica, and how she's so pretty (and how she's so pretty)
Lastly there's Dade
Still sitting on the dock
Ponders his life, and he skips his rocks
And he wonders when his father will return
   but he's not coming back

And he can't understand
   how everyone goes on breathing when true love ends
His mother whispers quietly...
Heaven's not a place that you go when you die
It's that moment in life when you actually feel alive
So live for the moment
And take this advice, live by every word
Love is just a hoax so forget everything that you have heard (forget everything)

And there's three, count 'em three
   children missing from the beach
They were eager to learn,
   to be taught and to teach

But the sad thing
   is that they never lived passed the age of fifteen
   due to neglect from their mother
Who was bed ridden by her ex-lover, their father
She didn't even notice, or pay much attention
   as the tide came in and swept her three into the ocean
Now all her advice, it seems useless

No, heaven's not a place that you go when you die
It's that moment in life when you touch her and you feel alive
So live for the moment
And take this advice, live by every word
Love's completely real, so forget anything that you've heard
   and live for the moment now

I am so freakin bored...so I figured I would update. I went and bought the Straylight Run cd and it's pretty good. I don't really know what to write in here today. I am going to Canada tomorrow and I don't really think it is going to be all that great. Cause one: it's supposed to be really shitty out tomorrow Two: Cameron is going to be there and I have a bad feeling about that cause with the crap going on. It's going to be all couples and..me. I hate when that happens. Anyone wanna be my date?! haha. 

I decided I am sick of being really preppy. I miss my old self....yes my old self. So I decided I am going to slowly go back to that. But not totally. It's complicated to explain. Whatever. So yea awesome.

Vacation's almost over bitches, this sucks. But I can't really complain cause it has been fun. Most of it at least. I hung out with some old friends yesterday which was fun. They came and kidnapped me from my house I was excited. haha. I went to my friend John's house because they were having band practice. They sounded real good too for not having the whole band there. They were trying to show me and Jami how to play guitar but it wasn't working to well. I was confused. Go figure. Yea, John is really hot. haha and I kind of told him that by accident yesterday. But it was really funny. Guess you had to be there. 

Stephanie and I got so bored on Tuesday that we walked to the mall. We had alot of fun though. We have some good pictures too, haha. We went in this one store and I put on all this crazy stuff and we were taking pictures and the lady was about to yell at us and I just kind of came out with..."umm I really like this jacket!!" Then she just gave us a look and walked away. haha. It was so freakin funny. Then we went into this prom dress store and put on the biggest puffiest dresses we could find and we put them on and took pictures. We had the lady takin pictures for us and they were laughing. I found these awesome glasses too! They were more like goggles and they were so cool! I looked like a bug! haha! Good times. 

Well I'm out. Bye!

Now you're gone 
I wonder why 
You left me here 
I think about it on, 
and on, and on, and on again 

I know you're never coming back 
I hope that you can hear me 
I'm waiting to hear from you 
Until I do.. 

You're gone away 
I'm left alone 
A part of me 
Is gone and I'm not moving on 
So wait for me 
I know the day will come 
I'll meet you there 
no matter where life takes me to 
I'll meet you there 
And even if I leave you here 
I'll meet you there 

I wish I could of told you 
the things I kept inside 
but now I guess it's just to late 
So many things remind me of you 
I hope that you can hear me 
I miss you 
This is good-bye one last time
http://blondie4e.livejournal.com/14670.html

Yesterday had to have been the WORST day possible. I talked to Cameron yesterday and he just told me straight out that he doesn't want to go out with me. He said he wasn't feeling a "spark" with us. I'm am so freaking glad that he waited 2 MONTHS to tell me this. Ugh it just sucks so bad. I kept telling Stephanie and Justin and everyone that I was getting sick of him because he wasn't asking me out or anything and I was just getting annoyed with him. But I never thought it would hurt this much when he actually told me. I never cried like that for someone either. I don't know, it just hit me hard I guess. I can't even eat because I feel so sick to my stomach. And on top of it I am going to Canada with him this Saturday. So that is not going to go to good either. I would feel bad if I told Jessica that I wasn't going because this is part of her birthday. So I am gonna go for her but I don't know how long I'll last till I go crazy. we'll have to see. 5 months...that's all I can think of. I just wasted 5 months of my life on nothing. See You At The Bitter End

I can't do it. I decided, I can't do it. I thought I was stronger. I was wrong. I need it. I need it. Blood, it's the only way. The only way for me to...die? No I don't want death. I just want out. But it seems my door is locked. I'm stuck. I'm stuck in this hell. Also known as my life. I've gotton to far. To far for anyone to help me now. It's just to late. I look in the mirror and what I see is...this poor girl. Sad, depressed, broken. I look away cause sometimes, all the time, I hate my own reflection. Her eyes, if only you could see the pain behind her eyes. Everyday I pray. I pray my life was just a dream. A dream I can't wake up from. I feel confused. I feel like life is playing a big joke on me. The girl in the mirror spoke to me. She spoke to me and said "Excuse me, but can I be you for awhile?" I looked away. Looked away as she called me, as she faded to black. I fear I am ordinary, just like everyone, to lie here and die among the stars, adrift among the days. I don't think there was ever a place for someone like me to be totally happy. I end up on the floor, hands wrapped around my stomach, head bowed. I can feel the warm tears on my cheeks. I open my eyes only to realize, I am still here. Oh but how I wish I wasn't. I have this voice inside my head, and it keeps telling me this world isn't meant for me. And as I look at my wrists a bloody mess, I begin to realize it's true.

So for some reason I got real down about some stuff yesterday. And I got bored in fifth period. I hate it cause I get in these moods and most of the time I don't know why. But that's why I write stuff like you just read cause I feel it helps me from actually doing it. I don't know, one of these days I'll understand...someday.
